title: Five-Star Amalfi Coast Escape in Positano with Daily Breakfast, Dining Credit & Spa Credit
description:
Experience the allure of Italy's famed Amalfi Coast with a stay at this exquisite boutique beauty. Perched high above the Tyrrhenian Sea, this five-star retreat offers panoramic views of Positano's pastel-coloured houses cascading down to the sparkling waters below. Savour the flavours of the Mediterranean at the Michelin-starred rooftop restaurant, Li Galli, or enjoy a refreshing cocktail at Gallis Bar or GOLD Sky Lounge oferring 360-views of Positano and the shimmering sea.

Explore the vibrant local art scene at the hotel's own art gallery, or venture out to the nearby Spiaggia Grande beach for a day of relaxation. A plethora of mesmerising beaches are within easy reach, while the hotel's spa and wellness area offers the perfect retreat after a day of coastal exploration.
